entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:28 PM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 35 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023
